poem:
### A Quiet Betrayal

In the hush of morning newsprint,  
a cruel revision unfolds—  
the hand that once guided  
now withdraws into silence,  
leaving the fragile  
to navigate the shadowlands  
unaided.  

A quiet betrayal,  
whispering through hospital halls,  
resonates as absence—  
a slow erasure of hope  
in a world already dim.
